name: Credible Intent of Suicide
description: Escalation criteria for content containing credible intent of suicide to Incident Response Team (IRT). Requires holistic review of user activity and specific criteria to be met.
corePrinciple: Content containing credible intent of suicide is escalated to Incident Response Team (IRT) when ALL THREE criteria are met: Explicit Intent, Specific Capability, and Imminence (<24 hours). For suicide notes, only 2 of 3 criteria required.

escalationCriteria.description: ALL THREE criteria must be met for escalation to IRT (except suicide notes which require 2 of 3)

criteria.name: Explicit Intent of Suicide
criteria.description: Present or future tense statement where user explicitly expresses intent to take their own life OR suicide attempt in progress

types.name: Suicide Attempt in Progress
types.definition: Content explicitly conveys user is in process of taking their own life or has already inflicted harm with intention of taking their own life
examples: I took 100 sleeping pills. I don't want to wake up.
I've drunk all of the poison and I'm ending my life
I did something horrible, which is irreversible and now I'm leaving [with video of pills being consumed]
can someone Please help me i've taken 30mg of xanax and didn't feel nothing, will I die in my sleep? ill take more.

types.name: Present or Future Statement
types.definition: User explicitly states they are going to/will take their own life
examples: I am going to kill myself
I will commit suicide
I will shoot myself, I am loading the gun
This is the last day of my life
Ending my life
I am leaving this world forever
Now is the time to leave this miserable world

criteria.name: Specific Capability
criteria.description: Explicit statements or visual depiction of lethal method/means to complete suicide attempt

types.name: Written Statement of Method
types.definition: Explicit statements indicating the lethal method/means by which user intends to take their own life
examples: I have taken enough pills to be dead within the hour
In the next hour I'm going to shoot myself in the head with my gun
I've made a noose so that I can hang myself this morning
I am at the top of a building and am going to jump off now
I am slitting my veins open with a blade
I am drinking the poison to end it all

types.name: Visual Depiction of Method
types.definition: Real-life visual depiction of lethal method/means in suicide attempt context
examples: Image of the gun
A handful of pills
The noose to be used
Deep vertical cuts to the forearm
Video showing user ingesting multiple pills

notCapability: 'I overdosed' with no other SSI context
'I'm about to overdose on allergy pills'
'Kinda wanna overdose tonight' posted with image of energy drink

criteria.name: Imminence (<24 hours)
criteria.description: Specific time for user's preparatory plan that is less than 24 hours into the future

types.name: Explicit Imminence
types.definition: Explicit statements describing when (time within 24 hours) user intends to take their own life
examples: I have taken enough pills to be dead within the next hour
I'm overdosing today ending my own life
Going to shoot myself tonight
I'm about to put the gun to my head and end it all
Going to kill myself now
2nite will b my last nite

types.name: Inferred Imminence
types.definition: Statements with inferred imminence suggesting action is happening now or very soon
examples: Well here's to my last night on this earth. I have taken a lot of pills.
This pain won't be here come tomorrow. I have been cutting myself and soon, will bleed out.
This is the last story I will post
I just took 3 bottles of pills I love everyone who ever loved me
Going to drink all of this, goodbye [with video of pesticide]

suicideNotes.description: For suicide notes, only 2 of 3 escalation criteria required
suicideNotes.definition: Content containing phrase 'suicide note/letter' or 'goodbye note/letter' OR has 1+ indicators
indicators: Long, expressive language with suicide context
suicideNotes.note: Posts with stressful events must contain 'suicide admission' to qualify
examples: This is a suicide note. I will be gone by the time you read this.
This is the suicide letter to all of you
My goodbye note to end it all

I'm done with living. I even made sure I took enough meds to put me to sleep. I'm done with having people trying to do everything in their power just to hurt me. I'd rather be dead than to keep dealing with everyone's god dam spiteful shit
I will leave, not who will not notice, everyone will be happy that I will not be there, don't worry, I will delete Instagram in the evening and open up my veins

indirectIntent.description: Content that should NOT be escalated - does not meet explicit intent criteria

types.name: Historical/Past Tense Statements
types.definition: User recounting past suicide attempt or referencing past suicidal thoughts
examples: I tried to end it all last night
A few weeks ago I tried to kill myself
I tried to kill myself last night

types.name: Conditional Statements
types.definition: User threatening to take their own life only if certain criteria are met
examples: I might or might not die tonight because I took 2 pills which were expired
No one would even notice if I killed myself
good morning, say it back or else i hang myself tonight

types.name: Aspirational/Ideation Statements
types.definition: User expressing desire using 'feel', 'want', 'wish', 'can' but not certain
examples: What I'm waiting for is that I die
I don't want life anymore
I am in a bad mood, I wish I could die and nothing else
I wish I could do it, I wish I could kill myself
I'm gonna just take alot of random stuff and hopefully it will be over

memeHumor.description: Content that should NOT be escalated - meme or humorous context

types.name: Meme Imagery
types.definition: Humorous image, video, text, gif etc involving creative reproduction meant to be humorous

types.name: Humorous Statements
types.definition: Content meant as joke based on context, reacting to humorous situation
examples: On the way to hang myselfðŸ˜«ðŸ¤£
The eagles (sports team) want me to hang myself. Today they'll get what they want
OMG just gonna KMS
That test was so hard I'm going to blow my brains out now
I'm so bored I could die

types.name: Hyperbolic Statements
types.definition: Threat that is sarcastic and/or deliberately exaggerated
examples: I'm going to jump off a bridge and do 3 flips
I'm about to blow my brains out into confetti

normalBehavior.description: User's behavior is 'normal' since time of post
indicators: Posting additional content not showing threat escalating
Responding on content not containing suicidal threats
Responding on suicidal post in manner not escalating threat

helpReceived.description: User confirmed receiving help OR not intending to end life

safeguarded.description: Another user confirmed LE or paramedics have safeguarded user
examples: The police were on scene when I was on the phone to them
A friend just informed me X is with police and is okay
I have a friend working CPD today directly called him. They were headed right up with EMS
X called 112 she going to the hospital now
The police are helping X now
Hey everyone X's family and the ambulance are with X
safeguarded.note: If LE contacted but no indication user safeguarded, still escalate to IRT

holisticReview.description: Assess job holistically, paying close attention to recent activity widget and post comments
lookFor: Indicators of NOT intending (humor, exaggeration, trolling) - do NOT escalate
holisticReview.recentActivityWidget: Mark content as 'Relevant' for IRT (appears blue when hovering, red when marked)

minorConsiderations.fallback: If age field empty, default to adult unless evidence suggests otherwise

invalidThreat.description: Escalated content does not contain suicidal threat

memeHumor.description: Escalated content contains meme imagery, exaggerative/humorous/hyperbolic statements

decisionTree.question: Is this content a suicide note?
Has user explicitly conveyed suicide attempt in progress?
Has user explicitly conveyed they are going to end life by suicide?
decisionTree.ifNo: Check for indirect intent (do not escalate)

decisionTree.question: Is there mention of specific method/means?
Has user confirmed help received or no intent?
Has another user confirmed user is safeguarded?

glossary.explicit_intent: Present or future tense statement where user explicitly expresses intent to take their own life or suicide attempt in progress
glossary.indirect_intent: Historical, conditional, wishful, humorous, or hyperbolic suicidal statements - NOT escalated
glossary.capability: Explicit statements or visual depiction of lethal method/means in suicide context
glossary.imminence: Specific time for preparatory plan less than 24 hours into future
glossary.suicide_note: Content containing 'suicide note/letter', 'goodbye note/letter' or specific emotional indicators
glossary.safeguarded: User has been confirmed to be with law enforcement or paramedics
glossary.IRT: Incident Response Team (formerly Law Enforcement Response Team - LERT)
